Discover the manipulative tactics corporate recruiters use to pressure candidates into signing job offers—often by targeting spouses and employing high-pressure sales techniques. In this video, I expose why recruiters try to “lock you in” and how to protect yourself from biased or intrusive questions. Plus, learn about my new course, Hacking the Resume, where I show you how to level up your resume, remove hidden biases, and get the job yo
title: HOW CORPORATE RECRUITERS MANIPULATE YOU
